name: Draw (jake kersten)
description:
--Actively in development--

Draw is a deck-building rogue-lite strategy game based around archery. (Haven't implemented the deck-building functionality yet)

Controls:
  • Mouse: Aim the bow and left click to fire
Gameplay:

Defeat all enemies (red squares) on the board without losing all health. Enemy health/attack-damage is indicated by size. The difficulty may increase after each wave.

Player turn:

  1. Aim with the mouse to choose a target.
  2. Press and hold the left mouse button to begin drawing back an arrow. Bow will draw back fully in two increments. Each increment a random arrow type will be chosen (never duplicates).
  3. Release left mouse to fire the arrow at a target (target can be changed while being drawn back ((beware of misses)).

Enemy turn:

  1. Advance all enemies on board.
  2. Any enemies that have reached the player's end of the board will attack (attack damage is based on enemy size).
  3.  New enemies are placed on the board (only if wave still has enemies left to place).

Arrow types:

  • Medium power - Single target (normal point, blue tail)
  • High power - Single target (large point, blue tail)
  • Low power - Multiple target (normal point, red tail)
